title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Real-Time Voice Feedback in Simulation-Based Language Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate language proficiency and basic simulation operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply real-time voice feedback with ≥85% accuracy in a simulated environment.
Learners can improve decision-making accuracy by 30% in evaluation scenarios within 72 hours after training.
Learners can recognize and explain the efficiency differences between voice and visual feedback with 90% confidence.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
